NoticeData.Contents: [ Added 'Patrol Reward' Function ] Earn a set reward every 12 hours depending on the level. Rewards can be earned every 12 hours over time even if you're not connected to the game. Can earn crystal and silver dust rewards. [ Added Nimble Aura Summon ] Nimble Aura Summon Additional Open to Summon with 10 Silver Dusts 1 out of 3 grades can be obtained by summoning. [ Added Nimble Aura equipment ] Add Nimble Aura equipment that all users can summon more than once a day Same aura confinement can be used as a reinforcing material The Nimble Aura is not eligible for purchase through NCG or for Voucher events.

[ Added 'Summon' Function ] Added 'Summon' menu in the workshop Through the Summon function, equipment recipes for crafting will be randomly determined, allowing you to obtain equipment. Equipment can be acquired immediately without any waiting period. Able to Summon various grades of Beast Aura. [ Added Aura equipment ] Added additional slot with equipment subtype as Aura Only equipment created through the Summon function can be worn in the Aura equipment slot. Aura equipment adds effects to your avatar. For more details, please refer to the following link: [https://bit.ly/9CUpdate_Intro_to_Aura](https://bit.ly/9CUpdate_Intro_to_Aura) [ Monster Collection Improvement ] We will provide a notification when the Monster Collection rewards have been changed. You can choose to adhere to the new reward policy or maintain the existing one after confirming the changes in the reward policy. If you switch to the new reward policy, it will reset aspects of your contract, including termination and reward collection timing. For more details, please refer to the following link: https://github.com/planetarium/NCIPs/blob/e105d87f152c42fcc6958aa4f545e131d7deb04a/NCIP/ncip-17.md

[Improvement] Improvement of the Equipment Item Upgrade Method Each Equipment Item has an initial experience based on its grade and crafting cost. Reinforcing the same kind of items with materials increases the experience value. If the experience value is higher than the value for a particular level, it becomes that level. Items of the same class and type have the same experience required to raise the level. As the level goes up, the stat number that increases is the same as before. Upgrades beyond level 4 consume the same NCG regardless of grade. Existing reinforced items are calculated to have the required experience to achieve the same level of reinforcement. We will explain the details through the community soon. Equipment Item Craft UI improvement Move to the top of the equipment category tab position Show in the list of items where the recipe does not exist X Add a condition to display the recipe and change the order of display according to the condition [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the opponent's rune level was treated the same as my rune level when fighting an opponent wearing a rune in Arena Battle
